description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国前政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任中共华东局第一书记、中央人民政府委员、中共中央组织部部长。后因卷入高岗饶漱石事件和潘汉年案件被开除党籍、逮捕判刑，在狱中病逝。
description.en: A former political figure in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former national-level deputy leader. He served as the First Secretary of the CCP East China Bureau, a member of the Central People's Government, and the Head of the CCP Central Organization Department. He was later expelled from the party, arrested, and sentenced in connection with the Gao Gang-Rao Shushi affair and the Pan Hannian case, and died in prison.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，后与饶漱石一同被认定为“高饶反党联盟”主犯。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who was later identified along with Rao Shushi as a principal offender in the 'Gao-Rao Anti-Party Alliance'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党政治人物，因其“内奸”问题牵涉到饶漱石，形成“饶潘扬反革命集团”案。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China, whose alleged 'traitor' issue implicated Rao Shushi, leading to the 'Rao-Pan-Yang Counter-revolutionary Clique' case.

description.zh-cn: 1954年至1955年中华人民共和国发生的一场重大政治斗争事件，导致高岗和饶漱石等人受到批判和整肃。
description.en: A major political struggle that occurred in the People's Republic of China from 1954 to 1955, leading to the criticism and purge of Gao Gang, Rao Shushi, and others.

description.zh-cn: 指控饶漱石、潘汉年、扬帆等人结成的“反革命集团”的案件，饶漱石被认定为首犯。
description.en: A case accusing Rao Shushi, Pan Hannian, Yang Fan, and others of forming a 'counter-revolutionary clique', in which Rao Shushi was identified as the main culprit.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。饶漱石于1925年加入，1955年3月因高饶事件被开除党籍。
description.en: The ruling political party of China. Rao Shushi joined in 1925 and was expelled in March 1955 due to the Gao-Rao affair.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Rao Shushi.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石早年就读的大学。
description.en: The university where Rao Shushi studied in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人。饶漱石在高饶事件中被指控反对刘少奇。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. Rao Shushi was accused of opposing Liu Shaoqi during the Gao-Rao affair.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间的一起军事冲突，新四军在此事件中损失惨重。饶漱石在事变中的表现受到中共中央肯定。
description.en: A military conflict during the Second Sino-Japanese War where the New Fourth Army suffered heavy losses. Rao Shushi's performance during the incident was affirmed by the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的抗日武装力量之一，饶漱石曾长期担任其政治领导职务。
description.en: One of the anti-Japanese armed forces led by the Communist Party of China, where Rao Shushi held political leadership positions for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 新四军副军长，在皖南事变紧急关头离开部队，饶漱石提议中央撤销其职务。
description.en: Deputy commander of the New Fourth Army who left the troops at a critical moment during the Wannan Incident. Rao Shushi proposed to the Central Committee to remove him from his post.

description.zh-cn: 新四军军长，在皖南事变期间与饶漱石一同领导部队并向中央发电汇报。
description.en: Commander of the New Fourth Army who, along with Rao Shushi, led the troops and sent telegrams to the Central Committee during the Wannan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，曾肯定饶漱石在皖南事变中的领导。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who affirmed Rao Shushi's leadership during the Wannan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家和政治家，曾任华东军区和华东野战军司令员，在职务上是饶漱石的下级。
description.en: A Chinese military strategist and politician who served as the commander of the East China Military Region and the East China Field Army, and was a subordinate of Rao Shushi in terms of position.

description.zh-cn: 发生在新四军内部的政治事件，此事件后，陈毅被调回延安。
description.en: A political incident within the New Fourth Army, after which Chen Yi was recalled to Yan'an.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，在黄花塘事件后被任命为新四军代军长，与饶漱石共同指挥军事行动。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, appointed as acting commander of the New Fourth Army after the Huanghuatang Incident, and commanded military operations jointly with Rao Shushi.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级领导人，与饶漱石存在矛盾，并曾一同鼓励粟裕向中央军委直呈建议。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China who had conflicts with Rao Shushi and once jointly encouraged Su Yu to present proposals directly to the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾被饶漱石和康生鼓励向中央军委“斗胆直呈”。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army who was encouraged by Rao Shushi and Kang Sheng to 'boldly present directly' to the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的职能部门之一，饶漱石曾于1952年至1954年担任部长。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, where Rao Shushi served as Head from 1952 to 1954.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央组织部常务副部长，与部长饶漱石存在不团结问题。
description.en: Served as the executive deputy head of the CCP Central Organization Department and had issues of disunity with the department head, Rao Shushi.

nodes.id: 扬帆 (上海市公安局局长)

zh-cn: 扬帆 (上海市公安局局长)

description.zh-cn: 因“内奸”问题被卷入“饶潘扬反革命集团”案。
description.en: Implicated in the 'Rao-Pan-Yang Counter-revolutionary Clique' case due to the 'traitor' issue.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高审判机关，于1965年8月判处饶漱石有期徒刑14年。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China, which sentenced Rao Shushi to 14 years in prison in August 1965.

description.zh-cn: 被指为“中统特务分子”，饶漱石被指控包庇他。
description.en: Accused of being a 'Central Statistics Bureau agent', whom Rao Shushi was accused of sheltering.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场政治运动，期间已被假释的饶漱石于1967年被重新收监。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, during which Rao Shushi, who had been released on parole, was re-imprisoned in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石的父亲，曾任江西省人民委员会副省长。
description.en: Father of Rao Shushi, who once served as the Vice Governor of the Jiangxi Provincial People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石与陆璀的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Rao Shushi and Lu Cui.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石同父异母的妹妹。
description.en: Half-sister of Rao Shushi.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石因被认定为“高饶反党联盟”主犯，而受到批判、解职、逮捕和判刑。
description.en: Rao Shushi was criticized, dismissed, arrested, and sentenced for being identified as a principal offender in the 'Gao-Rao Anti-Party Alliance'.

description.zh-cn: 高岗因被认定为“高饶反党联盟”主犯而受到批判和整肃。
description.en: Gao Gang was criticized and purged for being identified as a principal offender in the 'Gao-Rao Anti-Party Alliance'.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石被认定为“饶潘扬反革命集团”首犯，并因此被逮捕和判刑。
description.en: Rao Shushi was identified as the main culprit of the 'Rao-Pan-Yang Counter-revolutionary Clique' and was subsequently arrested and sentenced.

description.zh-cn: 潘汉年作为“饶潘扬反革命集团”的成员而被定罪。
description.en: Pan Hannian was convicted as a member of the 'Rao-Pan-Yang Counter-revolutionary Clique'.

relationships.target: 扬帆 (上海市公安局局长)

description.zh-cn: 扬帆作为“饶潘扬反革命集团”的成员而被定罪。
description.en: Yang Fan was convicted as a member of the 'Rao-Pan-Yang Counter-revolutionary Clique'.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石与陆璀是夫妻关系。
description.en: Rao Shushi and Lu Cui were husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石是饶思诚的儿子。
description.en: Rao Shushi is the son of Rao Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 陆兰沁是饶漱石的女儿。
description.en: Lu Lanqin is the daughter of Rao Shushi.

description.zh-cn: 饶玉莲是饶漱石同父异母的妹妹。
description.en: Rao Yulian is Rao Shushi's half-sister.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石于1922年入读上海大学。
description.en: Rao Shushi enrolled at Shanghai University in 1922.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石于1925年由中国社会主义青年团转入中国共产党，1955年3月被开除党籍。
description.en: Rao Shushi transferred from the Chinese Socialist Youth League to the Communist Party of China in 1925 and was expelled from the party in March 1955.

description.zh-cn: 因高岗饶漱石事件，饶漱石于1955年3月被开除出党。
description.en: Rao Shushi was expelled from the party in March 1955 due to the Gao Gang-Rao Shushi affair.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石于1952年至1954年担任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: Rao Shushi served as the Head of the CCP Central Organization Department from 1952 to 1954.

description.zh-cn: 在1953年的中央组织工作会议上，饶漱石对刘少奇发起攻击，被称为“讨安伐刘”。
description.en: At the Central Organization Work Conference in 1953, Rao Shushi launched an attack on Liu Shaoqi, which was known as 'denouncing An and attacking Liu'.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石与时任中组部常务副部长安子文存在不团结问题，并在1953年的中央组织工作会议上对其发起攻击。
description.en: Rao Shushi had issues of disunity with then Executive Deputy Head of the Central Organization Department An Ziwen and attacked him at the Central Organization Work Conference in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石与康生存在矛盾，这也是导致饶漱石在1954年夏天被打倒的原因之一。
description.en: Rao Shushi had conflicts with Kang Sheng, which was one of the reasons for Rao's downfall in the summer of 1954.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石与高岗结成“反党联盟”，共同进行反对刘少奇等人的活动。
description.en: Rao Shushi formed an 'anti-Party alliance' with Gao Gang, jointly carrying out activities against Liu Shaoqi and others.

description.zh-cn: 在皖南事变紧急关头，因项英擅自离队，饶漱石向中共中央提议撤销其职务。
description.en: At a critical moment during the Wannan Incident, as Xiang Ying had left his post without authorization, Rao Shushi proposed to the CCP Central Committee to remove him from his position.

description.zh-cn: 在皖南事变期间，毛泽东和中共中央肯定了饶漱石和叶挺的领导，并指示全党全军服从其指挥。
description.en: During the Wannan Incident, Mao Zedong and the CCP Central Committee affirmed the leadership of Rao Shushi and Ye Ting, and instructed the entire party and army to obey their command.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石在中共华东局和华东军区担任的职务始终高于陈毅，是陈毅的领导。
description.en: The positions held by Rao Shushi in the CCP East China Bureau and the East China Military Region were always higher than those of Chen Yi, making him Chen Yi's superior.

description.zh-cn: 黄花塘事件爆发后，陈毅被调回延安参加整风运动。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Huanghuatang Incident, Chen Yi was recalled to Yan'an to participate in the Rectification Movement.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石与康生一起鼓励粟裕向中央军委“斗胆直呈”，改变了内战南线战场的战略计划。
description.en: Rao Shushi, together with Kang Sheng, encouraged Su Yu to 'boldly present directly' to the Central Military Commission, which changed the strategic plan for the southern front of the civil war.

description.zh-cn: 康生与饶漱石一起鼓励粟裕向中央军委“斗胆直呈”，改变了内战南线战场的战略计划。
description.en: Kang Sheng, together with Rao Shushi, encouraged Su Yu to 'boldly present directly' to the Central Military Commission, which changed the strategic plan for the southern front of the civil war.

description.zh-cn: 1965年8月，最高人民法院判处饶漱石有期徒刑14年。
description.en: In August 1965, the Supreme People's Court sentenced Rao Shushi to 14 years in prison.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，已被假释出狱的饶漱石于1967年被重新收监。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, Rao Shushi, who had been released on parole, was re-imprisoned in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 在对饶漱石的判决中，他被指控包庇了“中统特务分子”胡均鹤。
description.en: In the verdict against Rao Shushi, he was accused of sheltering Hu Junhe, an alleged 'Central Statistics Bureau agent'.

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石与潘汉年、扬帆被一同认定为“饶潘扬反革命集团”的成员。
description.en: Rao Shushi, along with Pan Hannian and Yang Fan, was identified as a member of the 'Rao-Pan-Yang Counter-revolutionary Clique'.

relationships.target: 扬帆 (上海市公安局局长)

description.zh-cn: 饶漱石与潘汉年、扬帆被一同认定为“饶潘扬反革命集团”的成员。
description.en: Rao Shushi, along with Pan Hannian and Yang Fan, was identified as a member of the 'Rao-Pan-Yang Counter-revolutionary Clique'.
